name: It's always there
description:
A dark, sad and also philosophical game.

Controls: WASD/Arrows to move, Space to interact.
And most important: m to mute the sound ;)

Created for Ludum Dare 31 (Jam).

Theme: Entire Game on OneScreen.

My interpretation: you can see the entire content of the game on the screen the whole time, using multiple cameras rendered next to each other.
